about.details:
Incorporated in 2018, Finelistings Technologies Limited is engaged in various businesses, namely (a) retail of used luxury cars and (b) software development services.

1. Retail used luxury cars: In this segment, the Company sells used premium and high-end luxury vehicles with an average selling price of ₹ 40.00 lakhs. These include sedans, SUVs, sports cars, and convertibles. The company offers after-sales services and repairs through affiliated service centers. The company also helps its customers get financial support from third-party financiers. The company commenced operations and opened its first showroom under the Finecars brand "in August 2022 at Ambience Mall, Vasant Kunj, National Capital Region (NCR).

2. Software development services: Under this framework, the company offers cloud-based services, IT consulting services such as big data analytics, cloud architecture, data engineering, IoT solutions, and solutions such as business intelligence analytics, cloud development, cloud solutions, data management, digital transformation, IoT development, and web development.

As at October 31, 2023, the company had a total of 5 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Finelistings Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Finelistings Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 1100000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹13.53 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹123 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on May 7, 2024, and closes on May 9, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Finelistings Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Finelistings Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Finelistings Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Finelistings Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Finelistings Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Finelistings Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Finelistings Technologies IPO opens on May 7, 2024 and closes on May 9, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Finelistings Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Finelistings Technologies IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,23,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Finelistings Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Finelistings Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Finelistings Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Finelistings Technologies IPO will be done on Friday, May 10, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, May 13, 2024. Check the Finelistings Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Finelistings Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Finelistings Technologies IPO listing date is on Tuesday, May 14, 2024.
